00034 DEFINE_int32(iter,1000,"Number of iterations the topic modeller should be run");

00045 DEFINE_bool(restart,false,"Indicates use of failure recovery mode. The iteration to start with should also be specified");
00046 DEFINE_bool(online,false,"Uses online initialization instead of random");
00047 DEFINE_int32(startiter,1,"This the iteration at which failure recovery should start");
00048 DEFINE_bool(test,false,"Run the test pipeline. No updates are done & requires an earlier dump of the word-topic counts table");
00049 DEFINE_bool(teststream,false,"Run the test pipeline in streaming mode. Formatting is a part of the pipeline. No updates are done & requires an earlier dump of the word-topic counts table & dictionary");

00051 DEFINE_double(beta,BETA,"Weight of the Dirichlet conjugate for words");

00060 DEFINE_int32(model,1,"Unigram-1");
